meanings.sent1: Adipocytes in our body help store extra fat for energy.
meanings.sent2: The adipocytes in the body can expand when we gain weight.
meanings.sent3: The adipocytes were having a party, storing all the excess fat they could find!
meanings.sent4: Her adipocytes were like tiny treasure chests, holding onto every bit of fat.
meanings.sent5: The adipocytes resembled little balloons filled with fat, ready to be used.

meanings.definition: a type of cell found in adipose tissue
meanings.sent1: Scientists study adipocytes to understand how fat is stored in our bodies.
meanings.sent2: Adipocytes play a crucial role in regulating energy balance.
meanings.sent3: The adipocytes in the tissue were chatting about their important job.
meanings.sent4: In the world of cells, adipocytes are the guardians of fat storage.
meanings.sent5: The adipocytes stood out like stars in the adipose tissue, quietly doing their job.
